706714f-b.title: Brooklyn: Sheepshead Bay Road - Voorhies Avenue
706714f-b.text:
Sheepshead Bay Road, north of Voorhies Ave., showing at the left, property belonging to A. Soeller (1890) and in the background is the Island View Hotel (1890) known by its cupola, and to the right of it is the home of C.F. O'Neil. The collector and photographer states the
Island View Hotel to be the hotel of William Schuessler.
December 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, showing a close-up of the Island View Hotel at the N.E. corner of East 16th Street. Sheepshead Bay Road turns left at this point and
forms a sharp angle.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
706714f-b.folder: Sheepshead Bay Road & Voorhies Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

706715f-b.title: Brooklyn: Sheepshead Bay Road - Voorhies Avenue
706715f-b.text:
(1)
Sheepshead Bay Road, east side, south from Voorhies Ave., which is in
the foreground.
August 1, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, two years later.
Awgust 14, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
